html:
Hey there!

I had the pleasure to talk at Swift Heroes Digital on October 1, 2020.

The talk "Scalable Modular iOS Architecture" is about the unfolding of a multi-year iOS vision at Just Eat, restructuring the whole app from the ground up to make it modular and global across various markets.

I also covered some (I think) interesting bits about the history of the iOS team and the tech side of the company.
